titleStmt.title: VVine, beere, and ale, together by the eares A dialogue, vvritten first in Dutch by Gallobelgicus, and faithfully translated out of the originall copie, by Mercurius Britannicus, for the benefite of his nation.
Wine, beere, ale, and tobacco
titleStmt.author: Gallobelgicus.
Britannicus, Mercurius.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Iohn Groue, and are to bee sold at his shop, at Furniuals Inne Gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: In fact an original work in English.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
